title: Why do some gas station\'s prices fluctuate multiple times a day?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=4010 And we finally got an answer from Murphy Gas: The owner of the Murphy station referred inquiries to corporate headquarter.  Angelo Landis, general manager of Murphy USA, would only say that ñAt Murphy USA our goal is always to provide fuel at a competitive price.î What this means is that they can change the price whenever they like, such as at rush hour.
